summary: Adds a chest to Riverwood containing the Executioners full set of armor and his weapon.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Executioners Armor[/b]

This mod adds the Helgen Executioners armor and weapon to a respawning chest in Riverwood (Location in images). If you loose the first set, another set will respawn in the chest for you to take. Have fun with the armor, with the weapon and everything equipped I personally think it looks really cool.

To install, simply drag the .esp from the downloadable file into your Skyrim Data folder.

An endorsement is always appreciated :D

 - Falloutperson416
author: Falloutperson416
